title: Thomas Edison National Historical Park: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger         Thomas Edison National Historical Park Junior Ranger Book NPS Photo  EXPLORE                                               LEARN                                                PROTECT Hey Kids…Looking for something fun and free to do while at our park? Why not become a Junior Ranger! Explore your creativity and draw your own invention or pretend you are a representative of Thomas Edison National Historical Park to create an advertisement for our park. Hunt for Edison's Logo, complete the timeline and watch some early Edison movies.              Thomas Edison NHP Junior Ranger Badge and Patch NPS Photo  Successful Junior Rangers will take the official Junior Ranger pledge and receive a Junior Ranger badge. Work hard like Thomas Edison, complete the Bonus Questions and attend a Ranger led talk to also receive the Thomas Edison National Historical Park patch. Good luck, have fun and remember to Explore, Learn, And Protect our National Parks. To download your Junior Ranger book please click here. (PDF 3.6mb)            Web Ranger Patch NPS Photo  Be a WebRanger Kids! Learn about National Parks by becoming a WebRanger. As a WebRanger, you will travel to parks all over the country through the worldwide web. Your job is to have fun while learning about YOUR National Parks and the things YOU can do to care of them. Solve mysteries and puzzles, playgames, take part in stories, and gather secret words. Become a WebRanger! Click here to begin your adventure.
